name: Waste Of Time
description:
Welcome to Waste-of-Time! Controls:
  • A/D | rotate the player
  • W/S | move forwards/backwards
  • E | Interact
  • T | toggle between two movement types (inverts the rotation when driving backwards)
Mechanics:
  • You can create shelves by putting 2 crates on a pallet (Shelves can store up to 4 objects)
  • You can create big shelves by stacking two empty shelves (Big shelves can store up to 6 objects)
  • You can stack pallets (up to 6 pallets per stack)
  • Every 90 seconds a powerup will spawn that reduces the spawn rates when picked up
  • When two barrels collide for too long they explode and the game ends
Credits:
  • Chris987 (3d modeling, lighting)
  • neemos (coding, drawing)
  • Jidbo (coding)
  • Himusoka (sound design)
  • ALoTron (coding)
  • piegames (3d modeling, coding)
  • Reispfannenfresser (coding, drawing)
